fields.label: Navigation
fields.name: carousel_navigation
fields.instructions: Tick to enable the carousel navigation.

sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.name: carousel_type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type for the carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Text Layout
sub_fields.name: text_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Select text layout.

sub_fields.label: Customize
sub_fields.name: custom_content_enabled
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle custom content fields.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Insert an image. This image will overwrite default images for pages, posts, products, categories.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Insert a title. This content will overwrite titles of items like posts, pages, products, categories.

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Insert a subtitle.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the width of the carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Is Highlighted
sub_fields.name: is_highlighted
sub_fields.instructions: Tick to highlight the carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Url
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the url for the carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Post Item
sub_fields.name: post_item
sub_fields.instructions: Select the post for this carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Page Item
sub_fields.name: page_item
sub_fields.instructions: Select the page for this carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Product Item
sub_fields.name: product_item
sub_fields.instructions: Select the product for this carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Category Item
sub_fields.name: category_item
sub_fields.instructions: Select the category for this carousel item.

sub_fields.label: Button Style
sub_fields.name: button_style
sub_fields.instructions: Select the button style.

sub_fields.label: Style
sub_fields.name: style
sub_fields.instructions: Select style for this item.

sub_fields.label: Enable Custom Content
sub_fields.name: customize
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle custom content fields.

sub_fields.label: Custom Title
sub_fields.name: custom_title
sub_fields.instructions: Insert a title. This content will overwrite titles of items like posts, pages, products, categories.

sub_fields.name: custom_subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Insert a custom subtitle.

sub_fields.label: Custom Image
sub_fields.name: custom_image
sub_fields.instructions: Insert a custom image. This image will overwrite default images for pages, posts, products, categories.

sub_fields.label: Custom Url
sub_fields.name: custom_url
sub_fields.instructions: Insert custom url for the grid item.

sub_fields.label: Is Highlighted
sub_fields.name: is_highlighted
sub_fields.instructions: Tick to highlight the grid item.

sub_fields.name: configure_grid_area
sub_fields.instructions: Tick to configure the grid area for this grid item.

sub_fields.name: row_start

sub_fields.name: frame_width

fields.label: Direction
fields.name: slider_direction

fields.instructions: Insert a value for the speed of the slider (in seconds)

fields.name: slider_delay
fields.instructions: Insert a value for the delay of changing the slider's slide (in seconds)

fields.label: Items
fields.name: slider_items
fields.instructions: Slider, containing slides with images and text.
